Package javelin.controller.upgrade

Class Upgrade

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.upgrade.Upgrade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BreathUpgrade, ClassLevelUpgrade, Damage, EffectUpgrade, FeatUpgrade, NaturalArmor, RaiseAbility, Skill.SkillUpgrade, SpeedUpgrade, Spell, TouchAttack
    public abstract class Upgrade
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A improvement to a Combatant's Monster which has to be trained (which has a gold and time cost). Upgrades are distributed among Towns, like Items.
    See Also:
    Combatant#postupgrade(boolean, Upgrade), Combatant#postupgradeautomatic(boolean, Upgrade), Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • inform

        public abstract java.lang.String inform​(Combatant c)
        To be show before upgrade confirmation, containing relevant information that might help decide to buy it or not. For example, a Spell could show how many times it can already be cast by the Combatant in question.
        Returns:
        one line of text.

      • apply

        protected abstract boolean apply​(Combatant c)
        Parameters:
        c - Given an unit apply the upgrade on it.
        Returns:
        false if this is not a valid update. For example: already reached the maximum level on a class, cannot learn this spell level yet.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)

      • upgrade

        public boolean upgrade​(Combatant c,
                       boolean spendxp)
        Parameters:
        c - Removes/reapplies equipment before/after applying the upgrade.
        spendxp - If true, will update Combatant.xp if applied.
        Returns:
        See apply(Combatant).
        See Also:
        Combatant.equipped

      • upgrade

        public boolean upgrade​(Combatant c)
        Returns:
        As upgrade(Combatant, boolean) but does not update Combatant.xp.

      • validate

        public final boolean validate​(Combatant c,
                              boolean checkxp)
        Parameters:
        c - Uses a deep clone of this unit.
        checkxp - true to check if given enough has enough Combatant.xp to aplly this.
        Returns:
        true if can apply(Combatant) this upgrade.

      • getcost

        public java.lang.Float getcost​(Combatant c)
        1 CR = 100 XP.
        Returns:
        The CR cost to upgrade this Combatant or null if cannot apply(Combatant).

      • getname

        public java.lang.String getname()
        Returns:
        Name of this upgrade, possibly formatted or enhanced.

      • isusedincombat

        public boolean isusedincombat()
        TODO currently necessary due to usedincombat and Spell.castinbattle. Unify.

      • getall

        public static java.util.Set<Upgrade> getall()
        Returns:
        All available upgrades (found through Kit.

      • getall

        public static <K extends Upgrade> java.util.Set<K> getall​(java.lang.Class<K> type)
        Returns:
        Same as getall() but filters by instance type.
